long_description: The girls' Teva Tirra Metallic Sandals offer signature Teva comfort and performance with the added bonus of fun colors that she'll love on summer days. Synthetic nubuck and webbing strap uppers keep feet dry; open-toe construction does not allow water to pool. Microban(R) zinc-based antimicrobial solution helps prevent odors from developing. Teva Tirra Metallic Sandals have Durabrasion Rubber(TM) outsoles that provide great traction.
short_description: The girls' Teva Tirra Metallic Sandals offer signature Teva comfort and performance with the added bonus of fun colors that she'll love on summer days.
